name: Candy Blast Line
description:
From the maker of Fruit Burst™- the classic connect 3 puzzle, Candy Blast will bring you to the colorful and tasty candy kingdom for adventure! Connect 3 or more candies in same color to blast!

Let princess Ellie be your guide! She will show you all the sweet treats in Candy kingdom! You will find colorful candies, crackers with cream, sugar cube and delicious chocolate! Which flavor is your favorite?

Try to solve puzzles by reaching tasty goals: break all the crackers, melt chocolate and sugar cubes, unwrap candies, help retrieve Ellie’s magic wand, and collect magic keys! Great pace and cute elements/obstacles make this game so addicting!

-----------Candy Blast- Connect 3 puzzle features-----------

Hundreds of levels of new connect 3 puzzles 2017!
No Wifi or network needed!
It is a totally FREE tasty candy game!
Great for killing boring time
Exercise and also relax your brain!
Different chapters and sweet stories are waiting!
Gift box with great tools to help you pass the level easier!
Keep updating sweet candy levels!

------------------How to play Candy Blast--------------

Connect 3 or more candies in the same color and release your finger, sweet candies will blast!
If you can connect more than 7 candies, you will enjoy a powerful lollipop blast !
Breakdown the chocolate or sugar cube if they are in your way!

Welcome to our tasty Candy Kingdom! Start your adventure now!
